StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateP.]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@P.ID int ,@NwaID int ,@Date date.me ,@Height decimal(4,2) ,@Weight int ,@BodyFatPercent .oat ,@RunMinutes int ,@RunSeconds int ,@Pullups int ,@Hang int ,@Crunches int ,@Score int ,@LastEditBy varchar(15) ,@AmmoCanLi. int = null ,@Pushups int = null ,@ScoreRankID char(1) = null ,@PlankMinutes int = null ,@PlankSeconds int = null )
AS
UPDATE [dbo].[PFT] SET [NWA_ID] = @NwaID ,[PFT_DATE] = @Date ,[PFT_HEIGHT] = @Height ,[PFT_WEIGHT] = @Weight ,[PFT_BODY_FAT_PCT] = @BodyFatPercent ,[PFT_RUN_MINUTES] = @RunMinutes ,[PFT_RUN_SECONDS] = @RunSeconds ,[PFT_PULLUPS] = @Pullups ,[PFT_PUSHUPS] = @Pushups ,[PFT_HANG] = @Hang ,[PFT_CRUNCHES] = @Crunches ,[PFT_SCORE] = @Score ,[AmmoCanLi.] = @AmmoCanLi. ,[PFT_PLANK_MINUTES] = @PlankMinutes ,[PFT_PLANK_SECONDS] = @PlankSeconds ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() ,ScoreRankID = @ScoreRankID WHERE PFT_ID = @P.ID
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0
INSERT INTO [dbo].[PFT] ([NWA_ID] ,[PFT_DATE] ,[PFT_HEIGHT] ,[PFT_WEIGHT] ,[PFT_BODY_FAT_PCT] ,[PFT_RUN_MINUTES] ,[PFT_RUN_SECONDS] ,[PFT_PULLUPS] ,[PFT_PUSHUPS] ,[PFT_HANG] ,[PFT_CRUNCHES] ,[PFT_SCORE] ,[AmmoCanLi.] ,[PFT_PLANK_MINUTES] ,[PFT_PLANK_SECONDS] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,ScoreRankID) VALUES (@NwaID ,@Date ,@Height ,@Weight ,@BodyFatPercent ,@RunMinutes ,@RunSeconds ,@Pullups ,@Pushups ,@Hang ,@Crunches ,@Score ,@AmmoCanLi. ,@PlankMinutes ,@PlankSeconds ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,@ScoreRankID)
